text: Question 27 Assume a two-level inclusive cache hierarchy, L1 and L2, where L2 is the larger of the two. Consider the following statements. S1: Read misses in a write through L1 cache do not result in writebacks of dirty lines to the L2 S2: Write allocate policy must be used in conjunction with write through caches and no- write allocate policy is used with writeback caches. Which of the following statements is correct? e S1is true and S2 is false e S1is false and S2 is true Q S1istrue and S2 is true Q S1is false and S2 is false
